name: src/api/auth/AuthService.js
getQueryString
description: Get the query string parameter from the URL

params.name: field
params.description: The name of the parameter

params.name: url
params.description: Defaults to the current URL

name: validateParameter
description: Throw an exception if the parameter isn't set or the correct type

params.name: methodName
params.description: Name of the method to display in an error

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the parameter to display in an error

params.name: value
params.description: Parameter to be tested

params.name: expectedType
params.description: Expected `typeof` for the parameter

name: setupClient
description: Setup the OAuth client for login requests

name: assertClientValid
description: Throws an error if the client wasn't set up.

name: oauthSession
description: The current OAuth session's tokens

name: rememberMe
description: Whether the OAuth session should be kept in local storage.

name: logout
description: Clear the current session

name: redirectLogin
description:
Redirects the user to player.me to authenticate your app.
Once the user has accepted, they will then be redirected to the passed `redirectUrl` with whatever `state` you pass.
The user will also be sent to the `redirectUrl` if they decline.

params.name: redirectUrl
params.description: The URL the user will be redirected to from player.me, once they've accepted/declined

params.name: state
params.description: A string that is passed back to the redirect URL

return.description: The URL we're attempting to redirect to - in case automatic redirect fails

name: didRedirectLogin
description:
Returns an object if the passed or current URL looks like it was a login redirect.
You can use this to get the `state` originally passed to `AuthService::redirectLogin()`.

name: failedRedirectLogin
description: Returns an object if the passed or current URL looks like it was a failed login redirect.

name: processRedirectedLogin
description: If the user was redirected here via `AuthService::redirectLogin()` and the user accepted, then

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} Resolve: OAuthSessionResponse, state:string | Reject: Error|OAuthSessionResponse, state:string

params.name: redirectUrl
params.description: The URL used in AuthService.redirectLogin()

return.description: Resolve: OAuthSessionResponse, state:string | Reject: Error|OAuthSessionResponse, state:string

throws.description: If the user wasn't redirected here.

name: passwordLogin
description:
This is for mobile app developers only!
This will return a cookie named playerme_session. TODO Confirm this is still true

params.name: login
params.description: The login (username OR email)

params.name: password
params.description: The password

name: refreshLogin
description: Get a new token based on the old one

throws.description: If there's no refresh token

name: src/api/auth/OAuthSessionModel.js
OAuthSessionModel
description: A model representing a Player.me OAuth session.

name: constructor
description: Create a new Activity model.

params.name: obj
params.description: A player response object to initialise this model with.

name: accessToken
description: The OAuth session's active token.

name: refreshToken
description: The OAuth session's refresh token.

name: tokenType
description:
The OAuth session's token type.
i.e. "bearer"

name: expires
description: The date this session lasts until

name: expiresIn
description: The number of seconds until this session expires, since the session was last updated.

name: toHeaderString
description: Returns the string we're expected to pass to Player in a header.

name: addToLocalStorage
description:
Add this session to storage
TODO Cookie fallback

name: getFromLocalStorage
description: Get a model from local storage

name: removeFromLocalStorage
description: Remove a modal from local storage

name: src/api/auth/OAuthSessionResponse.js
OAuthSessionResponse
description: Response containing OAuth tokens

name: result
description: The response body

name: success
description: Whether this response was successful

name: src/api/request/APIService.js
validateURL

params.name: method

params.description: Name of the method this is being called in

params.name: data
params.description: The data to be used in the request

params.name: required
params.description: If the request body should be truthy

name: APIService
description: A singleton wrapper for Request adapters

name: _baseUrl
description: The URL that gets prepended to partial request URLs

name: _adapter
description: The adapter used to make requests

name: prependBaseUrl
description: Add the baseUrl to the start of the passed address

name: getAdapter
description: Get the current adapter

params.name: validate
params.description: Validate the adapter before returning it

throws.description: If adapter is invalid
If no adapter is set

params.name: adapter
params.description: Adapter instance or class

throws.description: If adapter is invalid

description: Throws an error if the adapter is invalid

params.description: The adapter to validate

name: src/api/request/adapter/JSONPRequestAdapter.js
JSONPRequestAdapter
description:
Process requests using JSONP.
Browsers allow this method for cross-domain calls, but only GET requests.

name: _lastCallbackId
description: The next ID to use in a callback reference name

name: _callbackNamespace
description: The object-chain up from window, where JSONP callbacks are stored.

name: _callbackContainer
description: The top object defined by CALLBACK_NAMESPACE, where JSONP callbacks are stored.

name: _setupCallbackContainer
description: Sets up the object-chain where callbacks are stored.

unknown.tagValue: {object} The topmost object in the chain.

params.name: namespace
params.description: A period-delimited list of child object names, starting from window

return.description: The topmost object in the chain.

name: _createObjectOnParent
description: Create an object on the parent, with the given name

name: _generateCallbackRef
description: Get the next available reference name of a callback

name: src/api/request/adapter/NodeRequestAdapter.js
NodeRequestAdapter
description:
Process requests using https://www.npmjs.com/package/request
For use in environments where cross-domain requests isn't an issue (i.e. Node.js, Cordova, etc)

name: request
description: Issue a request

params.name: method
params.description: The request method

params.name: url
params.description: The target URL

params.name: body
params.description: The request body

getHeadersFromXHR
description: Takes a XMLHttpRequest and returns the headers in key-value pairs.

name: XMLHttpRequestAdapter
description:
Process requests using JSONP.
Browsers allow this method for cross-domain calls, but only GET requests.

name: src/api/request/response/AbstractResponse.js
AbstractResponse
description:
This is an abstract wrapper around a RawResponse.
Sub-classes should be tailored to specific APIs.

name: raw
description: The raw request this wraps around

name: className
description: The name of this instance's class

name: success
description: Whether the response was successful

name: errorMessage
description: Returns an error message if success is false

name: statusCode
description: The resulting status code

name: statusMessage
description: The resulting status message

name: headers
description: The result headers

name: method
description: The request method used for this response

name: uri
description: The request URI used for this response

name: src/api/request/response/CollectionResponse.js
CollectionResponse
description:
This is an abstract wrapper around a RawResponse for a collection of entities.
Sub-classes should be tailored to specific APIs.

name: _modelClass
description: The class used to construct the result

name: _results
description: Array of results, instantiated with their model class

name: _pager
description: The pagination data for the response

name: results
description: The results from the API

name: pager
description: The pagination data for the response

name: src/api/request/response/EntityResponse.js
EntityResponse
description:
This is an abstract wrapper around a RawResponse for an entity.
Sub-classes should be tailored to specific APIs.

name: _modelClass
description: The class used to construct the result

name: _result
description: The result object, instantiated with it's model class

name: success
description: Whether the response was successful

name: result
description: The results from the API

name: src/models/activity/ActivityModel.js
ActivityModel
description: A model representing a Player.me Activity.

name: constructor
description: Create a new Activity model.

params.name: obj
params.description: A player response object to initialise this model with.

name: id
description: The activity's ID number.

name: resourceId
description: TODO What is ActivityModel resourceId?

name: type
description: The type of activity (i.e. "Video" or "Post").

name: user
description: The user that posted this Activity.

name: source
description: Where the Activity came from (i.e. "youtube", "twitch" or "player").

name: sourceUrl
description: The URL where this activity originated.

name: url
description: The partial URL where this activity is located on player.

name: fullUrl
description: The full URL where this activity is located on player.

name: publishedAt
description: The date this activity was published.

name: createdAt
description: The date this activity row was created.

name: updatedAt
description: The date this activity row was updated.

name: editedAt
description: The date this activity was edited, or null if never.

name: isSubscribed
description: If the current user has subscribed to this activity.

name: showEdit
description: If the user can edit this activity.

name: showDelete
description: If the user can delete this activity.

name: userIsHidden
description: If the user has hidden the author.

name: userIsBlocked
description: If the user has blocked the author.

name: userIsFollowed
description: If the user is following the author.

name: isOwnActivity
description: If the user is the author.

name: hasLiked
description: If the user has liked this activity.

name: likesCount
description: The number of likes this activity has received.

name: hasPinned
description: If the user has pinned this activity.

name: pinsCount
description: The number of pins this activity has received.

name: hasShared
description: If the user has shared this activity.

name: shareCount
description: The number of shares this activity has received.

name: commentsCount
description: The total number of comments on this activity.

name: comments
description: An array of comments the client has loaded.

name: post
description: Data about the post, if this Activity is the right type.

name: video
description: Data about the video, if this Activity is the right type.

name: isVideo
description: True if this Activity's type is a Video.

name: isPost
description: True if this Activity's type is a Post.

name: isFromYoutube
description: True if this Activity's source is YouTube.

name: isFromTwitch
description: True if this Activity's source is Twitch.

name: isFromPlayer
description: True if this Activity's source is Player.me.

name: hasAllComments
description: If the client has loaded all this activity's comments.

name: _getCommentIndex
description: Get the comment's index by its ID.

name: addComment
description: Add a comment to this activity.

name: updateComment
description: Override this activity's copy of a comment.

return.description: If there was an original to replace.

name: removeComment
description: Remove the comment.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} If there was a comment to remove.

return.description: If there was a comment to remove.

name: addCommentsToStart
description: Add comments to the start of the list, such as earlier comments.

name: src/models/activity/ActivityPostData.js
ActivityPostData
description: The main contents of an ActivityModel of type "post".

params.name: obj
params.description: Part of a player response object to initialise this instance with.

name: post
description: The post's formatted text.

name: postRaw
description: The post's un-formatted text.

name: metas
description: The post's related content.

name: game
description: The game that has been checked in, if any.

name: gameCheckInType
description:
The type of check-in for the game, if any (e.g. "playing").
TODO The API can apparently handle other types, but can the client specify them?

name: isPlayingGame
description: If the post says the author is playing a game.

name: ActivityPostMetaData
description: Metadata associated with a Post.

params.name: obj
params.description: Part of a player response object to initialise this instance with.

name: content
description: The meta's content type (i.e. "Photo").

name: title
description: The title of the metadata, if applicable.

name: description
description: The description for the metadata, if applicable.

name: provider
description: The provider for the metadata (e.g. "Player").

name: isInternal
description: TODO What is ActivityPostMetaData isInternal?

name: images
description: A list of image URLs.

name: url
description: The link to whatever's represented by the metadata (e.g. an image)

name: thumbnail
description: URL of the metadata's thumbnail.

name: src/models/activity/ActivityVideoData.js
ActivityVideoData
description: The main contents of an ActivityModel of type "video".

params.name: obj
params.description: Part of a player response object to initialise this instance with.

name: title
description: The video's title.

name: description
description: The video's description.

name: url
description: The URL of the video.

name: thumbnail
description: The video's thumbnail.

name: src/models/activity/comment/CommentMeta.js
CommentMeta
description: A class representing a Player.me Comment's assets.

name: constructor
description: Create a new Comment Meta instance.

params.name: obj
params.description: A player response object to initialise this object with.

name: images
description: An array of URLs to images.

name: url
description: Absolute path to this asset.

name: title
description: Title of this asset.

name: description
description: Description for this asset.

name: provider
description: The provider that hosts this asset.

name: content
description: The type of asset.

name: isInternal
description: TODO What is CommentMetaModel isInternal?

name: thumbnail
description: The URL of a thumbnail for the asset.

name: isPhoto
description: Whether this asset is a photo.

name: isVideo
description: Whether this asset is a video.

name: src/models/activity/comment/CommentModel.js
CommentModel
description: A model representing a Player.me Comment.

name: constructor
description: Create a new Comment model.

params.name: obj
params.description: A player response object to initialise this model with.

name: id
description: The comment's ID number.

name: userId
description: The ID of the user that posted the comment.

name: activityUserId
description: The ID of the original poster.

name: activityId
description: The ID of the activity this comment is on.

name: post
description: The display text for the comment.

name: postRaw
description: The entered text for the comment.

name: metas
description: Metadata associated with this comment.

name: createdAt
description: The date and time the comment was created on.

name: updatedAt
description: The date and time the comment was last updated on.

name: editedAt
description: The date and time the comment was last edited by the user on (or null).

name: deletedAt
description: The date and time the comment was soft deleted on (or null).

name: userIsBlocked
description: If the current user has blocked the user that wrote this comment.

name: user
description: The user that posted the comment.

name: hasLiked
description: Whether the logged in user has liked this comment.

name: url
description: The full URL to this post on the main player.me site.

name: showDelete
description: Whether the logged in user is able to delete this comment.

name: showEdit
description: Whether the logged in user is able to edit this comment.

name: isOwnComment
description: Whether this comment belongs to the logged in user.

name: likesCount
description: The number of likes this comment has.

name: like
description: Like the comment and update likesCount.

 * Models representing Comment entities as part of the Player API
 * @module models/activity/comment
 */

name: updatedAt

name: deletedAt

name: deletedAt

name: src/models/notification/NotificationModel.js
NotificationModel
description: A model representing a Player.me Notification.

name: constructor
description: Create a new Notification model.

params.name: obj
params.description: A player response object to initialise this model with.

name: key
description:
The notification's key.
A combination of the first character of the entity name, and its ID.

name: type
description: The type of notification

name: set
description: A combination of type and key, separated by a colon.

name: id
description: TODO What is this?

name: ids
description: TODO What is this?

name: user
description: TODO What is this?

name: url
description: The URL to go to the entity and clear the notification

name: createdAt
description: When the notification was created

name: names
description: The names of users at the start of the notification message

name: text
description: The text at the end of the notification message

name: image
description: Image to be used for the notification

name: unread
description: Whether or not the notification has been marked as read

UserExtendedModel

params.name: obj

name: descriptionHtml

name: coverOriginal
description: The path to the original cover image.

name: coverOriginalFilename
description: The original cover image's filename.

name: avatarOriginal
description: The path to the original avatar.

name: avatarOriginalFilename
description: The original avatar's filename.

name: createdAt
description: The date and time the user was created on.

name: generatedBy
description: TODO What is a user's generatedBy field?

name: isCurrentUser
description: Whether this is the logged in user.

name: isFollowing
description: Whether this user is following the logged in user.

name: isFollowed
description: Whether the logged in user has followed this user.

name: isFriend
description: Whether this and the logged in user are following each other.

name: isBlocked
description: Whether the logged in user has blocked this user.

name: canMessage
description: Whether the logged in user can message this user.

name: isOnline
description: Whether the user is logged in.

name: followingCount
description: The number of user's this user is following.

name: isConfirmedGroupMember
description: Whether the logged in user is a member of this group.

name: canConfirmMembership
description:
Whether the logged in user has rights to confirm memberships.
TODO Confirm the description for canConfirmMembership() is correct

name: canRemoveMembership
description:
Whether the logged in user has rights to remove memberships.
TODO Confirm the description for canRemoveMembership() is correct

name: src/models/user/UserModel.js
UserModel
description: A model representing a Player.me User.

name: constructor
description: Create a new User model.

params.name: obj
params.description: A player response object to initialise this model with.

name: id
description: The user's ID.

name: username
description: The user's username.

name: accountType
description: The type of account.

name: slug
description: The URL-friendly version of the user's name.

name: avatar
description:
The URL of the user's avatar.
Player provides a default.

name: cover
description: The URL to the user's profile cover image.

name: url
description: A relative URL to the user's profile.

name: followersCount
description: The number of followers the user has.

name: isFeatured
description: Whether Player.me has listed this as a featured user.

name: isVerified
description: Whether Player.me has verified this user.

name: isPartner
description: Whether this is a Player.me staff member or partner.

name: isPrivate
description: Whether this is a private user.

name: isUser
description: Whether the account is for a normal user.

name: isGroup
description: Whether the account is for a group.

content:
/**
 * Models representing User entities as part of the Player API
 * @module models/user
 */

name: src/realtime/RealTimeService.js

unknown.tagValue: The core Sails.io.js wrapper for PlayerMe

params.name: url
params.description: Server to connect to

params.name: autoGetCookie
params.description: Set to false if running outside of a browser and use `verifyWithOAuth`

params.name: options
params.description: Custom options to override the defaults

name: verify
description:
This will link the Socket ID to the User ID,
so that the Sails can send user-wide messages to the correct sockets.
Send this immediately after connect.
{@link http://docs.playerme.apiary.io/#reference/RealTime/oauth/authenticate-+++}

name: isVerified
description: Whether the user has been verified

name: verifiedUserId
description: The ID of the verified user, or 0

name: _checkVerified
description: Throw an error if the user isn't verified before calling the passed method name.

name: postTest
description: Send a message which will be picked up by onTest()

params.name: message
params.description: The message to make the round-trip.

name: src/realtime/Sails.js

unknown.tagValue: The base wrapper class for sails.io.js

name: _socket
description: The socket connection

name: _defaultConnectionOptions
description: The default options to use when connecting

name: _url
description: The URL used to connect

name: _options
description: The options used to connect

name: _connect
description: Connect to the specified Sails.io server

params.name: url
params.description: Server to connect to

params.name: options
params.description: Custom options to override the defaults

name: _reconnect
description: Reconnect with the arguments last passed to _connect().

name: disconnect
description: Disconnect sails

name: on
description:
Start listening for server-sent events from Sails with the specified eventIdentity.
Will trigger the provided callback function when a matching event is received.

params.name: eventIdentity
params.description: The unique identity of a server-sent event, e.g. "recipe"

params.name: callback
params.description: Will be called when the server emits a message to this socket.

throws.description: ReferenceError When a parameter wasn't specified
TypeError When a parameter is the wrong type
Error When the socket wasn't created first

name: off
description:
Unbind the specified event handler (opposite of .on()).

If you decide to use this method, be careful!
off() does not stop the this client-side socket from receiving any server-sent messages,
it just prevents the specified event handler from firing.

params.name: eventIdentity
params.description: The unique identity of a server-sent event, e.g. "recipe"

params.name: callback
params.description: Will be called when the server emits a message to this socket.

throws.description: ReferenceError When a parameter wasn't specified
TypeError When a parameter is the wrong type
Error When the socket wasn't created first

name: request
description: Send a virtual request to a Sails server using Socket.io.

params.name: method
params.description: The HTTP request method. (e.g. get/post/put/delete)

params.name: url
params.description: The destination URL path. (e.g. "/checkout")

params.name: data
params.description: Data to be included as the request body.

params.name: headers
params.description: Dictionary of request headers.

params.name: callback
params.description: Takes a body object and an object with headers, body and statusCode.

throws.description: ReferenceError When an argument is missing.
TypeError      When an argument is the wrong type.
RangeError     When an invalid method is passed.
Error          When the socket doesn't exist.

name: get
description: Send a socket request (virtual GET) to a Sails server using Socket.io.

params.name: url
params.description: The destination URL path; e.g. "/checkout".

params.name: data
params.description: Data to be included as the request body.

params.name: callback
params.description: Takes a body object and an object with headers, body and statusCode.

throws.description: ReferenceError When an argument is missing.
TypeError      When an argument is the wrong type.
Error          When the socket doesn't exist.

name: post
description: Send a socket request (virtual POST) to a Sails server using Socket.io.

params.name: url
params.description: The destination URL path; e.g. "/checkout".

params.name: data
params.description: Data to be included as the request body.

params.name: callback
params.description: Takes a body object and an object with headers, body and statusCode.

throws.description: ReferenceError When an argument is missing.
TypeError      When an argument is the wrong type.
Error          When the socket doesn't exist.

name: put
description: Send a socket request (virtual PUT) to a Sails server using Socket.io.

params.name: url
params.description: The destination URL path; e.g. "/checkout".

params.name: data
params.description: Data to be included as the request body.

params.name: callback
params.description: Takes a body object and an object with headers, body and statusCode.

throws.description: ReferenceError When an argument is missing.
TypeError      When an argument is the wrong type.
Error          When the socket doesn't exist.

name: del
description: Send a socket request (virtual DELETE) to a Sails server using Socket.io.

params.name: url
params.description: The destination URL path; e.g. "/checkout".

params.name: data
params.description: Data to be included as the request body.

params.name: callback
params.description: Takes a body object and an object with headers, body and statusCode.

throws.description: ReferenceError When an argument is missing.
TypeError      When an argument is the wrong type.
Error          When the socket doesn't exist.

name: _validateEventListener
description: Check that arguments for on()/off() are valid.

params.name: functionName
params.description: The method to be mentioned in error messages.

params.name: eventIdentity
params.description: The unique identity of a server-sent event, e.g. "recipe".

params.name: callback
params.description: Will be called when the server emits a message to this socket.

throws.description: ReferenceError When a parameter wasn't specified
TypeError When a parameter is the wrong type
Error When the socket wasn't created first

name: _validateRequest
description: Check that arguments for request() or get/post/put/del() are valid.

params.name: functionName
params.description: The name of the function to be used in error messages.

params.name: url
params.description: The destination URL path; e.g. "/checkout".

params.name: data
params.description: Data to be included as the request body.

params.name: callback
params.description: Takes a body object and an object with headers, body and statusCode.

throws.description: ReferenceError When an argument is missing.
TypeError      When an argument is the wrong type.
Error          When the socket doesn't exist.

name: src/realtime/api/AbstractRealTimeAPI.js
_responseMap
description: A 2D map of channels and actions to a list of functions

name: _mapResponse
description:
Indicate which methods `RealTimeResponse`s should be passed to,
based on their `channel` and `action`.

name: _routeResponse
description: Pass the response to the methods mapped with _mapResponse().

params.name: args
params.description: Any other arguments to pass to mapped methods.

name: src/realtime/api/RealTimeResponse.js

unknown.tagValue: The standard result for most Player responses

name: action
description: The action to be taken with this data.

name: channel
description: The channel this response came from.

name: key
description: The key of this response within its channel.

name: data
description:
The payload of the response.
Anything that isn't a property of RealTimeResponse.

name: src/realtime/api/feed/FeedRealTime.js
onActivityAdded
description:
Listen out for activities added to the feed
Can be triggered once you subscribeToFeed().

name: onActivityEdited
description:
Listen out for an activity being edited.
Can be triggered once you subscribeToActivity().

name: onActivityDeleted
description:
Listen out for an activity being deleted.
Can be triggered once you subscribeToActivity().

name: onCommentAdded
description:
Listen out for a comment being edited to an activity.
Can be triggered once you subscribeToActivity().

name: onCommentEdited
description:
Listen out for an activity's comment being edited.
Can be triggered once you subscribeToActivity().

name: onCommentDeleted
description:
Listen out for an activity's comment being deleted.
Can be triggered once you subscribeToActivity().

name: subscribeToFeed
description: Subscribe to tabs in the feed.

name: subscribeToActivity
description: Subscribe to a specific activity

name: subscribeToActivities
description: Subscribe to specific activities
